title: paNDigai koNDADuvOm
sahitya:
paNDigai kONDADuvOm aruT-paramanaip-paravi nal varangaLai vENDi nAm


anupallavi

  eNDishai ulagilum guNDup-pughai ozhittE ellArum anbuDan Eka rasamAi vAzhap-


caraNam    pADu paTTup-pizhaippOr vADudal aghanriDa paNamuDan Ighaiyum guNamurap-porundiDa
nADu varumaiyinri nal vaLam tazhaittiDa nALum pErinbam vandu vAzhvinir-shezhittiDap-
